member.name: M:DeviceInfo.Plugin.Abstractions.IDeviceInfo.GenerateAppId(System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Generates a an AppId optionally using the PhoneId a prefix and a suffix and a Guid to ensure uniqueness
The AppId format is as follows {prefix}guid{phoneid}{suffix}, where parts in {} are optional.
member.param: Setting this to true adds the device specific id to the AppId (remember to give the app the correct permissions)
Sets the prefix of the AppId
Sets the suffix of the AppId

member.name: P:DeviceInfo.Plugin.Abstractions.IDeviceInfo.Id
member.summary: This is the device specific Id (remember the correct permissions in your app to use this)

member.name: P:DeviceInfo.Plugin.Abstractions.IDeviceInfo.Model
member.summary: Get the model of the device

member.name: P:DeviceInfo.Plugin.Abstractions.IDeviceInfo.Version
member.summary: Get the version of the Operating System

member.name: P:DeviceInfo.Plugin.Abstractions.IDeviceInfo.Platform
member.summary: Get the platform of the device
